story.title: Out of the Closet
story.storyDescription: Betty: Hey honey it’s your mom texting you.

messages.text: Hey honey it’s your mom texting you.
Yes mom I know it’s you. We talked about how texting works remember?
Your name is in my phone so you don’t have to keep telling me it’s you.
Well I suck at these things. You know that.
Yeah. What did you want to tell me?
I’m running late. I had a conference with a student at school.
Could you help me out and just be sure to email me that power point and the extra links I have up on my computer.
Mom you don’t need to email it. You can just plug in your computer to one of the projectors.
I know, but I use the schools computers and just like doing it that way.
Yeah no problem. I’m heading to Eric’s soon, so I’ll see you this time tomorrow.
Okay good night and have fun.
the next day
Landon one of the kids played a mean trick on me today.
That sucks. What happened?
Well it was the start of class and I was getting my stuff set up.
okay
And then I go to my email to click on the link to pull up my power point and after I clicked I went to something else
because it always takes a minute or so to start up.
I have no clue where this is going.
Oh I didn’t either at the time.
Well I notice the kids all looking at the over head projector and making comments like,
“I really have to start doing the reading homework for this class.”
And “what page was this stuff on”.
Not one of them even tried to warn me.
Mom just come out with it already.
It was a one of those GIF things with two men?
You mean like those quick little repeating video clips?
Yes! One of those things. I was mortified and tried to take it down.
I couldn’t believe that’s what happened when I clicked the link on my computer.
I tried it a few more times and more of my students noticed because I didn’t unplug the cord that hooks it up the large monitor
so they kept seeing it repeat. It was two men with a close up camera angle of them...in a sexual act.
Oh gosh mom. I am really sorry this all happened this way.
Don’t be. I wasn’t embarrassed I went to those kids one by one and made up reasons for why I suspected each one of them.
You did that? Mom you could get fired! One of them is bound to complain.
OH no worries. I’m a hop, skip and a jump rope away from retiring anyway.
But this class is very open-minded. Very off bunch. They all just laughed it off.
What if they tweet it or start telling their friends and it gets out? Mom I’m really sorry.
Well one girl admitted that she did, but she didn’t say my name. It’s fine.
Why are you apologizing? To make it even better I really gave them a show and left it on the screen for a bit. That had their attention.
Mom it was me. When you asked me to do that stuff for you last night Eric was over.
So you and Eric pulled a fast one...April Fool’s Day will come soon for the two of you.
No mom. Eric did it to make you question me.
I don’t think I see what you’re getting at.
You know I wouldn’t be upset with you for a harmless prank. Eric either. He’s your best friend.
I’m not truly upset about this.
I know mom. I love you.
Honey you’re acting strange. Why won’t you answer the phone?
I know you're there you were just texting me!
Landon. I’ll be home soon alright? It’s fine honestly.
I thought it was really funny. I even told some of my staff about it.
I obviously didn’t try to do it again until it was safe and what do ya know the darn thing worked right that time.
You kids are good with computer gadgets these days.
Mom I don’t think I should be here when you get home. I don’t think you will want that.
Landon. What is it?
He did that to make me tell you about me and him.
I wasn’t ready and you always talk about how old fashioned you are.
I want you to still love me. I won’t do this without you.
You’re scaring me. I have your father hurrying to get there. Just talk to me. You know we will love you regardless.
I’m gay. I’m sorry mom.
I really am I tried fighting it for so long. I feel horrible.
Landon. You are my son. I will always love you.
I’ve had my suspicions, but I wanted you to confirm or deny it. Who you love doesn’t change my love for you.
Really? But grandma and grandpa would hate this...and they did raise you.
Oh honey they also raised me to be sane, but your mom is a rebel.
I love you mom.
I love you too sweet heart. Don’t you ever be afraid to be who you are.
I feel so relieved.
Not so fast. You’ve been dating Eric and having him over...we will talk about that. You are only 17.
Oh gosh please don’t have ‘the talk’ with me again.
Okay honey...I’ll have it with both of you together and he can’t spend the night over anymore.
And you know many boys only want one thing from you
I should have told you when I was 18. And mom please don’t go there.
You will still be my child no matter how old you get. And I am so going there.
You are a very nice boy and other boys will try to take advantage of that.
Mom stop! This is embarrassing and weird.
I’ll be home soon. Call Eric over. We will have this talk with both of you. I’ll teach you to prank me again.
